data.name: Manderley Fine Furniture
data.description: Are you looking for the best Sofa Stores Toronto? You are at the right store. The Manderley Fine Furniture is full of variety, and the quality is all one requires. The priority of the luxurious feel is not anymore, a dream now. Our Store represents the quality and the designs that can adore your place with the feeling of living. All you need to do is to contact us and have a look at our best offers. Address- 545, Mount Pleasant Rd, Toronto, ON. M4S 2M5 Tel- 416-486-3045 Email- sales@manderleyfinefurniture.com

data.name: Whatsapp Background
data.description: Change the background of your Whatsapp Web or your chat background with any image (GIF's allowed) that you want It only changes the the background of the Whatsapp Web page by default, feel free to customize.
